conbody.p: An annotation provides additional technical information on domain elements. Any element that belongs to a domain model supports annotation, and so does the domain itself.
Annotations are intended for internal use for Design Studio and back-end services.

The following annotations can be customized:
Annotation for datasets dedicated to search functionality; see section Query builder annotation .
Annotation for presenting foreign entity values in a combobox; see section .
Annotation for setting a scope of dataset instance to the user session, cross pageflow; see section .
